house_listing.house_description: Great starter home - ideal for young couple starting out. Built in storage space - room ideal for computer plus 3 bedrooms, replacement vinyl windows, many upgrades. 11800 btu wall ac unit. On cul-de-sac. Storage shed in rear a pleasure to show.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Office, Ranch Style, Skylights,Storage Space, Utility Room
